title: Cravat End, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cravat end of Mechlin with a central cartouche filled by a bowl of flowers and surrounded by floral and foliated branches interspersed by volutes, terminating in scrolls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cravat End, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Mechlin style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-19.
